subject: Concussions
Football
Helmets
Accidents and Safety
organizations: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment
lead_paragraph: The National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment has come under government scrutiny for having only one drop-test standard designed to guard against skull fractures.
snippet: The National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment has come under government scrutiny for having only one drop-test standard designed to guard against skull fractures.
